title: Drawing, "Slight Sketches Including a Soldier with a Rifle", 1862
medium: Graphite, heightened with pen and ink on pasteboard
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description:
Recto: Vertical view of two soldiers, shown in three-quarter length, with color notations.

Verso:  Slight sketches in graphite, including one of soldier resting on a rifle with fixed bayonet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Slight Sketches Including a Soldier with a Rifle", 1862.
1862. Graphite, heightened with pen and ink on pasteboard. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-162.
